creator: talkspirit
descriptionHtml:
Talkspirit is an Enterprise social network (secure internal social network, for companies) that allows to connect all employees, even those without an email address (frontline workers).

Talkspirit is the perfect solution for:
• Communication and remote collaboration
• Decrease the number of meetings to save time
• Reduce internal emails to improve efficiency

With talkspirit for Android:
• Access the directory to find your colleagues on the platform
• Discuss with them by chat (individual or group) at any time
• Reduce the number of emails exchanged by posting in groups or via private messages
• Use video conferencing and screen sharing instead of time-consuming meetings
• Send private messages to your colleagues even if they are offline
• Find in your newsfeed the latest publications related to your projects, your job and the groups you follow
• View news feed in card mode or list mode (synthetic)
• View planned events and create new ones in the shared calendar
• Capitalize your shared files (unlimited storage)
• Search for any information / message / document / event from our performing search engine
• Keep your messages synchronized in real time on all media (PC, tablet, mobile)
• Receive push notifications to keep you informed about new publications / activities and new chat messages
• Broadcast live events via the livestream

... And much more !

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- You can now add reactions to chat messages
- Access to public videoconference links
- Audioconference improvements
- Improvement of visual materials (icons, preview, colors) linked to web version
- Performance improvements
- Bug fixes

• Use video conferencing and screen sharing instead of time-consuming meetings
• Send private messages to your colleagues even if they are offline
• Find in your newsfeed the latest publications related to your projects, your job and the groups you follow
• View news feed in card mode or list mode (synthetic)
• View planned events and create new ones in the shared calendar
• Capitalize your shared files (unlimited storage)
• Search for any information / message / document / event from our performing search engine
• Keep your messages synchronized in real time on all media (PC, tablet, mobile)
• Receive push notifications to keep you informed about new publications / activities and new chat messages
• Broadcast live events via the livestream

... And much more !

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Bug fixes (application startup, links handling)

title: talkspirit

creator: talkspirit
descriptionHtml:
Talkspirit is an Enterprise social network (secure internal social network, for companies) that allows to connect all employees, even those without an email address (frontline workers).

Talkspirit is the perfect solution for:
• Communication and remote collaboration
• Decrease the number of meetings to save time
• Reduce internal emails to improve efficiency

With talkspirit for Android:
• Access the directory to find your colleagues on the platform
• Discuss with them by chat (individual or group) at any time
• Reduce the number of emails exchanged by posting in groups or via private messages
• Use video conferencing and screen sharing instead of time-consuming meetings
• Send private messages to your colleagues even if they are offline
• Find in your newsfeed the latest publications related to your projects, your job and the groups you follow
